name: Fastmail.com | Dark w/ Red Highlights
description: FastMail does not have a dark theme, so I decided to make my own. I didn't spend much on it, it has subtle gradients and added shadows in areas where contrast is needed. If there are any suggestions or feedback, do let me know and I'll happily address.
additional_info:
V1.0 - Released on Userstyles.org
V1.1 - Fixed issues with anchors, general font color issues, selected states, and hover effects.
